step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched overhead and fingers are open.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. Keep your fingers open as you prepare for the next movement.
Focus on making a tight fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles.
Great job stretching your arms back overhead. Remember to exhale and relax as you return to the starting position.
You're completing the repetitions well. Continue to focus on the full range of motion and controlled breathing.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Keep up the good work with stretching your arms overhead and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to breathe with each movement.
